H0.text: For which team did Babe Ruth blast his last Major League home run. New York Yankees

H1.text: For which team did Babe Ruth blast his last Major League home run. Philadelphia Phillies

H2.text: For which team did Babe Ruth blast his last Major League home run. Brooklyn Dodgers

H3.text: For which team did Babe Ruth blast his last Major League home run. Boston Braves

A5.text: He clouted what turned out to be the last three home runs of his career in what remains one of the most memorable afternoons in baseball history.

A6.text: Ruth retired on June 1, only six days after he clouted what turned out to be the last three home runs of his career.
